Simulated data based on PhD thesis of P.J.A. Stam (2007) — phd_data
code: df <- phd_data()            # df w/ 100 observations and random seed #> [1] "Reminder: random seed" df <- phd_data(1000)        # df w/ 1000 observations and random seed #> [1] "Reminder: random seed" df <- phd_data(1000, 1234)  # df w/ 1000 observations and seed 1234 #> [1] "Reminder: seed set at 1234"
